name: projetomodeloorangehrm
description: Inicialize o projeto Node.js ```Bash npm init -y ```

scripts.allure:clear: rm -rf allure-results allure-report || del /s /q allure-results allure-report
scripts.test:allure: cypress run && allure generate allure-results --clean -o allure-report && allure open allure-report
scripts.relatorio: cypress run && allure generate allure-results --clean -o allure-report && allure open allure-report
